data.text:
De chauka, de chhakka. 
Fir ho jaaye dhoom dhadaka🏏

#SpiceJet welcomes cricket teams on board.

#FlySpiceJet #SpiceJet #Cricket #Team #cricketteams #India #SouthAfrica https://t.co/jCwraVM6DH
@PARAMJE77819575 You're welcome!
@PARAMJE77819575 Kindly mention the first name in the last name column as well.

@diveygupta Hi Divey, kindly initiate a DM so we may share the details.

https://t.co/UMdB9lKlTP
@PARAMJE77819575 Please allow us some time to check this.
@PARAMJE77819575 Paramjeet, please note, the last name in booking must be as per the visa. As such, you may check the visa and proceed accordingly.

@writer_swapan Hi Swapan, kindly note that SpiceJet follows a dynamic pricing structure whereby the fares vary as per the seat availability per flight. We only have a certain number of seats available for a specific price, and once those are purchased, the next available fare is released.
@medimojovikas As mentioned earlier, please note that charges shall be applicable on allocation of preferable seats. You can proceed with auto check-in for non chargeable seats.

@medimojovikas Hi Vikas, please note that charges are applicable on allocation of preferable seats. In order to avoid any additional charges, passengers can always opt for the auto-assign option at the time of check-in during the seat assignment process.

@__keshavb Hi Keshav, please note that charges are applicable on allocation of preferable seats. In order to avoid any additional charges, passengers can always opt for the auto-assign option at the time of check-in during the seat assignment process.

@Amru_J11 We understand your situation, Amresh. We wouldn't stop if it weren't necessary. Sorry for the 
inconvenience.
@Rashinair95 Rashi, as checked the booking is confirmed through a third-party website. We request to kindly contact your agency for any clarifications.
@Rashinair95 Hi Rashi, kindly DM us your PNR so we may check the details. https://t.co/Qi2laHRc1E
@sunnyjainn Hi Sunny, kindly DM us your PNR and elaborate on your concern so we may check the details. https://t.co/Qi2laHRc1E
@Sandeepkhaitan Hi Sandeep, currently, we do have connecting flights available on the mentioned route. Please stay tuned for updates regarding the direct flights.
@rabijitdutta Hi Rabijit, kindly DM us your PNR so we may check the details. https://t.co/Qi2laHRc1E

data.text: @shaggu_here Hi Shagufta, please note "Ok to board” is required only for ECR passport holders not for ECNR passport holders travelling on visit/tourist visa. Kindly refer to point no. 3.1.8 (International) at https://t.co/V8EEVlzTn5 for detailed information.
@vikasinha06 Vikas, we are working on your concern. Please allow us some time, we shall get back with an update soon.
@kr_swap Hi Swapnil, we are in receipt of your email. Our team is working upon your concern and shall get back to you at the earliest. We request your patience.
@anuragkr40 Hi Anurag, currently, we do have connecting flights available on the mentioned route. Please stay tuned for updates regarding the direct flights.
@mrr_gaurav Hi Gaurav, please note, the birth certificate or hospital discharge certificate (original) will be accepted as valid id proof for the infant on domestic flights.
@rohansanghi Hi Rohan, kindly DM us your PNR so we may check the details. https://t.co/Qi2laHRc1E

@nitin_cd Hi Nitin, We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback. We are glad that our inflight team assist you well onboard. Further, we request you to kindly share your PNR via DM and elaborate on your instance with our ground staff. https://t.co/Qi2laHRc1E

@RajeGangarde Hi Rajendra, kindly DM us your PNR and complaint number so we may check the details.

https://t.co/UMdB9lKlTP

@L_Dadhwal Hi Lakhvinder, please help us with the passenger ID proof via DM so we shall check and assist. 

https://t.co/UMdB9lKlTP

@Amru_J11 Hi Amresh, your flight is affected due to operational reasons and shall depart at 1140 hours. We always try our best to maintain departures as per schedule. However, at times, due to unavoidable reasons, we face delays. Please contact our airport staff for any assistance.

@rkjbrjn Hi Rakesh, please DM us your PNR so we shall check and assist.

Don't forget to like and follow our social media handle. Share a photo or video content about us on your social media feed (post/story/reel), and tag us using the hashtag #MySpicyLife.
Hurry! Participate now. https://t.co/YzCIDrEZQQ

Thank you Priya Kumari for choosing SpiceJet as the preferred airline partner for your parents' first ever flight.
It was a delight to have them on-board with us and we can’t wait to fly them again, so please accept free return tickets for your parents as a gesture from Spicejet. https://t.co/q76IHCC10A

data.text: RT @nishargshah: @flyspicejet Thanks Spicejet for a wonderful flight from Patna to Ahmedabad. Before time arrival, excellent meal, superior…
@wasims247 We wish you a pleasant flight, Wasim. Stay #RedHotSpicy 😀

@Preeshash Preesha, please note that drone is permitted only in check-in baggage without battery. However, batteries are allowed only in hand baggage, whereas it should not exceed more than 160 watts hr.

data.text: @AwandkarPrasad Further, if the travel agency still denies for the refund, kindly share the email/tweet response so we may take it up with our team. 2/2
